headline: Tech Weekly podcast: Jo Twist of UKIE, and GDC 2012
text: Aleks Krotoski is joined by Charles Arthur to round up the week's technology news, including the new iPad and Yahoo's patent battle with Facebook. Simon Parkin joins us straight from San Francisco with news from the Games Developers' Conference. And the head of the UK's Interactive Entertainment trade body, Jo Twist, joins us to reveal her strategy for making games a priority in the forthcoming UK budget. Don't forget to...
